basic.description: This course is an introduction to investment/security analysis. Includes an examination of investment instruments, the investment environment, the concept of risk-return, and the interactive forces between the economy, industries, and individual firms.
basic.subject: FIN
basic.title: Investments

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CGS 2518, FIN 3244, and FIN 3403 with a grade of "B-" or better.
